meanings.definition: A small rose-shaped decoration or ornament.
meanings.sent1: The cake was beautifully decorated with delicate rosettes made of frosting.
meanings.sent2: She wore a lovely dress adorned with rosettes at the hem.
meanings.sent3: The playful kitten batted at the rosettes on the gift box.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the night sky formed a celestial rosette of twinkling lights.
meanings.sent5: The intricate rosettes on the ceiling added elegance to the room.

meanings.definition: A cluster of leaves or petals arranged in a circular pattern.
meanings.sent1: The gardener carefully arranged the colorful rosettes of flowers in the bouquet.
meanings.sent2: The succulent plant had rosettes of green leaves growing in a perfect circle.
meanings.sent3: The artist painted a whimsical scene with rosettes floating in the air.
meanings.sent4: The dancers moved gracefully, forming a rosette of swirling skirts on the stage.
meanings.sent5: The rosettes of petals in the garden created a vibrant display of colors.

meanings.definition: A circular arrangement of objects or design elements.
meanings.sent1: The intricate clock had golden rosettes marking each hour.
meanings.sent2: The mosaic floor was adorned with colorful rosettes in a geometric pattern.
meanings.sent3: The children played a game, arranging their toys in a rosette formation.
meanings.sent4: The chef garnished the dish with a rosette of whipped cream.
meanings.sent5: The intricate rug featured a central rosette surrounded by intricate patterns.
